datasets/MVTec_Loco/mini/juice_bottle/tr: The juice in the bottle appears to be a reddish or wine color, which is appropriate for cherry juice. The fruit depicted on the label is a pair of cherries. The bottle appears to be mostly full, with a small air gap at the top. Yes, there are two stickers on the bottle: one at the bottom with the text "100% Juice" and another at the top with the illustration of the cherries. The cherries are located approximately in the middle of the top label.
